title: Problem with pvp.net
body:
Hello! I have problem with pvp.net connection.
I only didn't see my friends and chats. Can you help me?
https://cloud.mail.ru/public/DpQE/YAC3PWYLy

 this is screenshot [](https://cloud.mail.ru/public/DpQE/YAC3PWYLy)

replies.body: A constant connection is necessary to maintain chat features in the client.  It looks like you might be having a network issue that's unable to maintain a connection and kicking you off.  No worries, this can get fixed up by following the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  That should get you fixed up for good, but let me know if you have any issues!
Hm this steps in your connection issues guide didnt help me.

Thanks for the update on this.  Please[ submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)to player support, and our tech team can help you!  It will also help a lot to obtain a set of logs with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), which will provide some more context on the issue.  Our tech team will reach out to you asap!
before I didn't have this problem
